"I see your reasoning, however I do not believe that it is just to
simply a=
ttack her." Pereus said, then turning to Blacknightmare, "More
to the point=
... are you still loyal to Unicron?"

Guardia turned and looked at Perseus =
when he said the name Unicron.

Meanwhile...

Celeron remained hidden, watc=
hing and listening.
